mapper.sql: id, createtime, createuserid, deptid, integralrecordtypeid, status, memberid, consumptionNum, name, memberName, memberPhone, integralid, clearid, isDueToRemind
mapper.select: SELECT DATEDIFF(now(), a.createtime) dlff, (a.consumptionNum*c.producteatingdose) sumday,((a.consumptionNum*c.producteatingdose)-DATEDIFF(now(), a.createtime)) poorDays, a.* FROM main_inventory_management a INNER JOIN main_due_to_remind b ON b.productId = a.integralrecordtypeid INNER JOIN main_integralrecordtype c on c.id=b.productId WHERE b.`status` = 0 AND a.isDueToRemind = 1 and a.memberid=#{memberId} and ((a.consumptionNum*c.producteatingdose)-DATEDIFF(now(), a.createtime)) <= b.dueToRemindDays
